name: better than sex  strawberries
instructions: crush vanilla wafers into fine crumbs and line a square 8x8 pan, mix butter or margarine and sugar, add beaten eggs, spread the mixture over the wafer crumbs, crush strawberries and spread over sugar , egg , and butter mixture, cover strawberries with whipped cream, sprinkle with chopped nuts, chill 24 hours
ingredients: vanilla wafers, butter, powdered sugar, eggs, whipping cream, strawberry, walnuts
